plot outline: Sathya is a leading criminal advocate after successfully wins a rape case against the victim Sainnaba he is now consulted to handle a compromising situation regarding the suicide attempt of Maya. Dealing with her father and here Sathya cames to the conclussion that Maya is very bold and intelligent and it is not very easy to convince her and her father. He keeps calm and requests her father to take her for a long drive with him.
title: Law Point
